title: Note: Do not tell them you're muting them or reporting them as this is permanently bannable offense.
body:
> Jenny711 (Riot Games Player Support)
> Jan 23, 20:07 PST
> 
> Hey again,
> 
> I have personally investigated your case and can say this was not a mistake. Your account was permanently banned after being escalated through multiple levels of punishment due to your continued negativity. It was not just a few games but through multiple games that _**you showed levels of extreme toxicity. **_

My Email Reply: 
Can you cite me examples of extreme toxicity within the 4 games btwn my 14 day ban and my permanent ban? 

>  Below I have pasted chat logs from the two games that I felt lead to the permanent ban.

Here is the second game as its paste log is shorter, but this is pasted in full as given to me as one of the two games I was "extremely toxic"

[7:41] ResistImpulse (Volibear): GHOST VOLI
[7:44] ResistImpulse (Volibear): HOW ELSE DO I GANK
[7:56] ResistImpulse (Volibear): muting

[18:46] ResistImpulse (Volibear): no vayne
[19:00] ResistImpulse (Volibear): you do it i report you
[19:05] ResistImpulse (Volibear): you dying too much
[19:35] ResistImpulse (Volibear): check jungler kda before stealing his buffs

[21:58] ResistImpulse (Volibear): 2v4 there
[22:29] ResistImpulse (Volibear): muting and reporting you malph

[25:04] ResistImpulse (Volibear): reporting you vayne
[25:51] ResistImpulse (Volibear): fyi lux, if i get pissed and begin int feeding its cause vayne and malph ebing super bm to me
[26:07] ResistImpulse (Volibear): she takes my red buff
[26:15] ResistImpulse (Volibear): nah ia m not chill
[26:23] ResistImpulse (Volibear): ii have zero reason to playwith tema nd group mid
[26:29] ResistImpulse (Volibear): when my team doesnt respect me and takes my buffs
[26:42] ResistImpulse (Volibear): anmd you taking her side pisses me off
[29:09] ResistImpulse (Volibear): took 4 of em


	
> Jenny711 (Riot Games Player Support)
> Jan 24, 15:38 PST
> 
> Hey again,
> 
>_** I understand you're getting harassed**_ but_** I recommend muting players who are toxic**_ at the first sign. Muting them prevents further harm coming through to you. The mute button is the best line of defense you have to shield yourself against these players. In the future, do mute them and just report them at the end of the match.** _(Note: Do not tell them you're muting them or reporting them as this is a punishable offense.)_** These reports actually help us by using valuable tracking information to help escalate players to our attention. Reporting them using the end game report feature is the best way to escalate them to our attention. Each report brings violators of the Summoner's Code one step closer to restricted chat or suspension by our investigative audits.

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 

_** (Note: Do not tell them you're muting them or reporting them as this is a punishable offense.)**_
